flawed_nl_solution:
Micah can type 20 x 60 = <<20*60=1200>>1200 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 40 x 60 = <<40*60=24000>>24000 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 24000 - 1200 = <<24000-1200=22800>>22800 words more than Micah in an hour.
#### 22800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 24000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
